author: sky.cactus
content: Is there a ZK construct that can easily recover an Ethereum address from an ECDSA signature that results in a proof that is easy to verify on Ethereum?

author: sky.cactus
content: I need to prove ownership of an address that meets some requirement (e.g., has X ETH balance) without leaking any details about the address.

author: sky.cactus
content: I can create a merkle proof of the balance and verify that in a ZK proof, but I'm not sure if I can do an ECDSA recovery in a merkle proof.

author: sky.cactus
content: More specifically, I'm not sure I can do it easily/quickly.
